si.title: අද මුදල් විනිමය අනුපාතය
body_lines: එක්සත් ජනපද ඩොලර් මිලදී ගැනීමේ මිල රුපියල් 286.445 කි.

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was 286.4435 rupees and the sales price were 295.0915 rupees based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Tuesday (17).

summary_lines: US dollar exchange rate: 286.4435 INR buy, 295.0915 INR sell.
